p: Significant correlation in the IgM Abs to Flu B could be found between children and adults (p = 0.02). Two gentle peaks presented, with the first occurring from December 2016 to February 2017, and the second occurring from September to November 2017. It is worth noting that in the winter of 2017, during the epidemic of the B/Yamagata lineage, the positive rate of IgM Abs to Flu B was consistently stable in adults and even decreased in children as compared with that in previous months ( Fig 3).
